title: So yeah, fuck ADCs.
body:
5k health. 220 armor. 210 MR. Voli's passive.

Wanna guess what happened?

Ashe, in her EVER SO FUCKING BALANCED STATE, right clicked on me and killed me in ~1.2 seconds. 

But yeah, ADCs are balanced. Lifesteal isn't fucking broken. Tanks are worth a damn. Riot isn't a greedy, shitty company. Yep.

replies.body: I call bullshit on this one. Complete and utter bullshit.
Ask anyone in that game. I literally could not go in without instantly dying. The more tanky I built, the faster I died. I couldn't even get 3 stacks of my W before I was dead.
voli is super kiteable and easy to kill for most adcs late game, especially if they have some peel.
Even with all crits and max attack speed this couldn't happen.
All these crazy stories from tanks dying to adcs alone in 1 second lel
